ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] D2 Kakis List
ygData.msgSnippet: I managed to get back to act 3 liao, seems must restart on nightmare then can go back to other acts on normal mode. Anyways, I suggest we make a fixed name and
ygData.messageBody:
I managed to get back to act 3 liao, seems must restart on nightmare then
can go back to other acts on normal mode. Anyways, I suggest we make a fixed
name and password for a game so anyone who knows it can try joining the game
when entering bnet.
Also, the server is not down, it just limits the maximum number of games
created. Try making the game over and over again for 5-10 mins and if really
cannot, try joining all the games availiable. Usually if really cannot
create, can find one that can join.

Leshrec
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 10, 2000 1:54 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] D2 Kakis List


> How come no D2 kakis in Asia server? Leshrec already gone to act 4, and I
> got no kakis to fight thru act 3. Anyone range between lvl 20-30 pls send
> me a tell in Asia server, my user ID is "tyronelee", thx.
>
> If cannot find kakis, I think I start training a necro liao, coz my barb
is
> having a very hard time clearing the forest. Always kena shoot from
> up-down-left-right by those small tribemen from opposite river side ;(
>
> Somemore few persons trying to open a game and all join in is better than
> each of us trying to open our own game...
>
>

> wrote:

> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>

> lag
> > has killed me 4-5 times (other time I managed to quit/save when the lag

> > playing happily. Just tat Korean international connection sux like hell,
> > sigh.
> > Dunno it's it a blessing in diguise, Australia site have not received
the
> > game yet. Wait till they rec'd, hehehe.
> >
> > Ziltus
